transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir very good afternoon.
Customer: Yeah, good afternoon, sir.
Executive: I am Ramesh from IndiaMART sir. Am I speaking to Mr. Gupta?
Customer: Yeah, yes, tell me, sir.
Executive: So how is the services sir? I think you are not consuming any buyleads sir.
Customer: What happened, sir?
Executive: Sir, actually location only complaining from north side, so can't able to purchase that.
Executive: Sir, your voice is very low. I am not able to hear you properly.
Customer: Sir, actually north side location only it was showing, sir.
Executive: Okay, that is why you are not purchasing any buyleads.
Customer: Yes, sir. Previous, previously purchased buyleads also you can check that, sir.
Executive: Mostly, uh, your lead coming from Haryana or Delhi, like that only coming, sir.
Customer: Haryana, Maharashtra, Telangana, not preferred location, sir. You need to increase the not preferred location. Right now, you have only eight states.
Executive: Sir, your voice is not audible, sir. Just a minute.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yeah, audible now, sir?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Yeah, I'm, I'm saying that we need to increase the not preferred location, sir. So that we will not get any leads from these location. Right now, there are only eight, I guess seven states you have mentioned here. Uh, and one is country. You have mentioned one country and seven states as not preferred location. Patna, Ahmedabad, Ahmedabad is a city. And Jammu Kashmir you have marked as a state, Telangana as a state, Maharashtra as a state, Haryana, Gujarat, Nepal.
Executive: So you need to increase the number of states in not preferred location. Also, you need to add, uh, cities in not preferred location. So that in future you will not get any leads from those location in which you are not dealing in.
Customer: Okay. Sir, actually suppose we consuming that lead means irrelevant location only it was coming, sir. And also, uh, that area we can't able to convert that as order, sir. That's why we are not consuming. If suppose we are, uh, selling, we can able to purchase all the buyleads, right, sir? I just wanted to increase your preferred, uh, okay, not an issue, sir. I'm purchasing that means you can able to tell, uh, actually we providing buyleads and all, but that is not a potential buylead, right, sir?
Executive: Yeah, I understand. So let's do one thing, sir. Let, let's add all the cities, uh, as not relevant in which you are not dealing. For example, in Delhi, we are not dealing in Delhi. So we can mark it as not preferred location. There is a city.
Customer: Many time I given like that, sir. Not relevant. Previous history also I am, uh, I'm doing that, sir. If suppose it was coming from north side means, uh, we are, uh, selecting like that. Not irrelevant area like that only we giving, sir.
Executive: Sir, but you haven't added these cities in not preferred location. Uh, have you opened your IndiaMART right now? Is your IndiaMART open?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Uh, please go to the setting option, sir.
Customer: Just a minute, sir.

Customer: Yeah, tell me, sir.
Executive: Uh, there you will find four option, notification, account, PNS call setting, buylead preference. You need to click on buylead preference.
Customer: Okay, just a minute. Yeah, buyleads, buyleads and tenders, right, sir?
Executive: No, no, no. In the setting option, sir. In setting option, please click on the setting option.
Customer: Okay, I selected setting option. It shows notification, account setting, PNS call setting, buylead preference.
Executive: Yes, you need to click on buylead preference.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: And after clicking it, you will find the option of not preferred location. Here you have to, uh, mention all the cities and states in which you are not dealing. First you need to add state, then you need to add cities. So that, uh, most of the leads that you will get are filtered out by city.
Customer: Not preferred location already we selected Nepal, Gujarat, Haryana, Maharashtra.
Executive: You, you have added, you have added eight states and cities. So you need to increase it more. Like you haven't added Rajasthan, uh, cities of Rajasthan. You haven't added Uttar Pradesh. You haven't added Chhattisgarh. You haven't added, uh, Odisha or any states there are.
Customer: Okay, if suppose that bulk order means we can able to supply, supply from here, sir. If we providing like that means that, uh, once, uh, lead it was coming means, uh, that will, uh, skip, no?
Executive: Okay, okay. So you only can deal in all the states, but the lead quantity must be bulk, right?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Okay, uh, there was a lead, uh, 27 minutes ago, hydraulic cylinders from Delhi and the required quantity was 10 piece and the probable order value was around 1 to 2 lakh. So was this lead relevant to you?
Customer: It's a buyleads you telling, right?
Executive: So I'm asking is the lead, I mean, is the lead is relevant to you as per the order size or order value?
Customer: Yeah, this one we can able to do, sir.
Executive: Okay, so please click on the buylead and go to past lead section and mark it as I am interested.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: After that, there is only from Assam, but for single piece from Karnataka, hydraulic cylinder for lift elevator from Bengaluru, Karnataka, 19 hours ago, two piece and probable order value was around 20 to 60,000. But this lead is from Bengaluru, Karnataka. So you can also mark it as I am interested.
Executive: There is a lead from hydraulic, uh, from Tamil Nadu, Coimbatore, uh, with the name hydraulic cylinder and the quantity was around 50 piece. Order value was around 2,75,000 to 5 lakh.
Customer: I already, uh, selected that I'm interested.
Executive: Okay, so you have marked it as I am interested. That's good.
Executive: Uh, all the leads are from Gurugram, Haryana, Gandhinagar, Gujarat, Mumbai, Maharashtra, Dhanbad, Jharkhand.

Executive: Sir, there, there was a lead industrial plant hydraulic cylinder. Is this product relevant to you?
Customer: Which one you telling, sir?
Executive: Industrial plant hydraulic cylinder. Industrial hydraulic cylinder from, quantity you are telling?
Executive: The quantity was around 50 piece. Bore diameter is 50 ton. Order value is around 2,50,000 to 3,25,000. But this lead was from, sorry, Gujarat.
Customer: Gujarat.
Executive: You can mark it as I am interested.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: I think 16 only one piece.
Executive: Sir, your voice is very slow, man. I cannot hear you, I cannot hear you properly.
Customer: Okay. Just a minute.
Executive: Is there any other lead which is, uh, relevant to you in terms of order size and location?
Customer: Sir, bulk order means we can able to supply anywhere, sir.
Executive: Yes, I understood, sir. I got your point. Bulk order means, can you specify the probable order value size?
Customer: Uh, minimum above 50,000 or above 1 lakh.
Customer: Above 1 lakh or, uh, 1 lakh above we can able to supply, sir.
Executive: Okay, above 1 lakh you can able to supply. From the beginning itself I'm telling, telling this one, sir. Actually, uh, north side means that labor cost and everything, uh, raw material cost everything, uh, very low when compared to Tamil Nadu. So if we, we providing quotation, uh, we can't able to convert that as order, sir. That's one issue.
Executive: Actually, sir, they have multiple options of sellers. So they are taking the quotations and comparing them and, uh, I mean, they find wherever suitable, they will, uh, convert their deal from those sellers.
Customer: Okay, sir. Another thing, sir, actually from Tamil Nadu any other persons they consuming buyleads, uh, for, uh, competitors they purchasing the buyleads from north side, north side I need to know, sir.
Executive: Sir, can we do one thing? Can we connect on Google Meet?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Is it possible?
Customer: Yeah, you can share the link, sir.
Executive: Just a minute, I'm sharing you the link. Uh, can you confirm me your mail ID, sir?
Customer: Uh, let's say, yeah, Pradeep@unitedgroupcompanies.com.
Executive: United group. Group or groups?
Customer: Group companies, not groups.
Executive: Okay, United group. Just a minute. Pradeep@united group companies. Dot in or dot com?
Customer: Dot com, sir.
Executive: Dot com, okay.
Executive: Okay, so I have shared the mail, sir. Please check. I have shared the meeting link. Please check and join, sir.
Customer: Okay, just a minute, sir.
Executive: Okay, sir.
Customer: Okay, just a minute, just a minute, sir. I'm not receiving any mail.
Executive: United group companies.com. Pradeep P R A D E E P@united group companies.com.
Customer: Yes, sir. Yes, sir.
Executive: Okay, have you got the mail?
Customer: I'm not received any mail, sir.
Executive: Uh, one second I will load it. Can I share it on your WhatsApp?
Customer: Yeah, yeah, I received that, sir. Now I'm going to, okay, okay, please join. I'm disconnecting the call, okay?
Customer: Okay, sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to increase not preferred locations.

- Irrelevant leads from north side locations.

- Competitors purchasing buyleads from north side.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to add not preferred locations.

- Executive shared a Google Meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, not preferred, google meet
